templates.title: RustFS
templates.name: rustfs
templates.description: RustFS is a high-performance, distributed object storage system built in Rust. It combines the simplicity of MinIO with the memory safety and raw performance of Rust. It offers full S3 compatibility, is completely open-source under Apache 2.0 license, and is optimized for data lakes, AI, and big data workloads.
templates.note: High-performance S3-compatible object storage built in Rust
